ca.ualberta.cmput301w13t11.FoodBook
Class MyIngredients

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.ualberta.cmput301w13t11.FoodBook.ActivityWithPopup
          ca.ualberta.cmput301w13t11.FoodBook.MyIngredients
All Implemented Interfaces:
FView<DbManager>
public class MyIngredients
extends ActivityWithPopup
implements FView<DbManager>

Displays all of the local users ingredients in a list and gives the option to edit said ingredients

Author:
Thomas Cline and Pablo Jaramillo

Field Summary
static java.lang.String NO_RESULTS
           
static java.lang.String SEARCH_TIMEOUT
           
 
Constructor Summary
MyIngredients()
           
 
Method Summary
 void OnAddIngredient(View View)
          Responds to the "Add ingredient" button which prompts the user to add an ingredient in a pop-up
 void OnCancel(View v)
          Responds to the "Cancel" button in the pop-up, which closes the pop-up without making any changes
 void onDestroy()
          Deletes the view when ending the activity
 void OnGotoMainMenu(View View)
          Responds to the "Main Menu" button, returning the user to the main screen
 void OnIngredientSearch(View View)
          When the "What can I make?" button is presssed, searches for recipes that can be made with the ingredients that are currently available
 void OnOK(View v)
          Responds to the "Ok" button in the pop-up, which closes the pop-up and saves the new ingredient added into "My Ingredients"
 void OnRemoveIngredient(View View)
          Responds to the "Remove" button which removes all of the ingredients that the user has checked from the local "My ingredients"
 void update(DbManager db)
          Allows the database manager to call the update to the views
 void updateIngredients()
          If a change is made to "My ingredients" list the activity will update to reflect the changes
